casebody.data:
MAGYAR SAVINGS BANK, Plaintiff,
v.
Carol A. MICHAELS a/k/a Carol Colucci, Carol Colucci Michaels, Defendant,
and
John T. Michaels, Defendant-Movant,
and
State of New Jersey and Ashbrook Care and Rehabilitation Center LLC, Defendants. M-1201/1202 September Term 2017
078868 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 1, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a motion for reconsideration as within time (M-1201) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification (M-1202) is denied.
